channel.title: The Geek Trading Co.
channel.description: Recent content on The Geek Trading Co.

item.title: White Dwarf 125
item.description: Whilst perusing Mengel Miniatures on my regular trawl of the blogs, I stumbled across an article about “My very first White Dwarf” and it got me all nostalgic and thoughful. What was my first White Dwarf? White Dwarf 125 it was. It’s long since lost, unfortunately, to a house move that went bad. andy chambers white dwarf 125 And Games Workshop has only now released the End of Times! Omens and portents abound.

item.title: About the Geek Trading Co.
item.description: ratboy is widely (in)famous for his almost tectonic painting speed. That’s not to say that he play with unpainted miniatures; just that he tries to avoid it as often as possible. He was, at one time, whispered about in fearful tones anywhere players of toy soldiers gather. In Melbourne. he is the man, the myth, the legend: Ratboy! You have to just know that there’s a story behind that nikcname, right?

item.title: Bloodbowl
item.description: This t-shirt is everything you’ve dreamed of and more. It feels soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch. It’s comfortable and flattering for all. 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (Heather colors contain polyester) Fabric weight: 4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²) Pre-shrunk fabric Side-seamed construction Shoulder-to-shoulder taping Blank product sourced from Guatemala, Nicaragua, Mexico, Honduras, or the US This product is made especially for you as soon as you place an order, which is why it takes us a bit longer to deliver it to you.

item.title: Keep calm and declare Exterminatus sticker
item.description: Keep calm and declare Exterminatus These stickers are printed on durable, high opacity adhesive vinyl which makes them perfect for regular use, as well as for covering other stickers or paint. The high-quality vinyl ensures there are no bubbles when applying the stickers. *High opacity film that’s impossible to see through Fast and easy bubble-free application Durable vinyl, perfect for indoor use 95µ density Don’t forget to clean the surface before applying the sticker.

item.title: Keep calm and get more Dakka T-Shirt
item.description: Here is some text. ** DAKKA!! DAKKA!! DAKKA ** AGhazghkull Mag Uruk Thraka, the scourge of Armageddon knows it. The Arch-Maniac of Calverna knows it. Skullkrumpa knows it. Across the 41st millennium Ork warlords big and small know it. Keep Calm And Get More DAKKA! It’s a universal Ork-y truth. This t-shirt is everything you’ve dreamed of and more. It feels soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch.

item.title: Keep calm and roll double pow
item.description: Keep calm and roll double pows These stickers are printed on durable, high opacity adhesive vinyl which makes them perfect for regular use, as well as for covering other stickers or paint. The high-quality vinyl ensures there are no bubbles when applying the stickers. *High opacity film that’s impossible to see through Fast and easy bubble-free application Durable vinyl, perfect for indoor use 95µ density Don’t forget to clean the surface before applying the sticker.

item.title: Nuffle he hates me sticker
item.description: Nuffle is a bastard! These stickers are printed on durable, high opacity adhesive vinyl which makes them perfect for regular use, as well as for covering other stickers or paint. The high-quality vinyl ensures there are no bubbles when applying the stickers. *High opacity film that’s impossible to see through Fast and easy bubble-free application Durable vinyl, perfect for indoor use 95µ density Don’t forget to clean the surface before applying the sticker.

item.title: Straight outta Cadia T-Shirt
item.description: Cadia guarded the only known navigable route to and from the massive Warp rift known as the Eye of Terror, a passage called the Cadian Gate. The world’s dangerous proximity to the Eye of Terror made it necessary for the people of Cadia to heavily fortify the planet. Cadia still STANDS! This t-shirt is everything you’ve dreamed of and more. It feels soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch.
